items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: String Utility TS is a lightweight, easy-to-use library for JavaScript and TypeScript that provides a collection of commonly used string manipulation functions. Whether you're working on a small project or a large-scale application, this library aims to simplify string operations with clean, efficient, and well-tested utility functions.
items.title: gurrudev/string-utility: String Utility TS is a lightweight, easy-to-use library for JavaScript and TypeScript that provides a collection of commonly used string manipulation functions. Whether you're working on a small project or a large-scale application, this library aims to simplify string operations with clean, efficient, and well-tested utility functions.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: Lightweight Angular component that loads async data, handles errors and switches templates based on loading state.

items.content_html: A basic DNS server built with Node.js, leveraging the dgram and dns-packet libraries to handle UDP socket communication and DNS packet encoding/decoding. This lightweight server responds to DNS queries based on a predefined database, showcasing how to implement custom DNS resolution in Node.js.
items.title: Dinesh-manickan/Basic-DNS-Server: A basic DNS server built with Node.js, leveraging the dgram and dns-packet libraries to handle UDP socket communication and DNS packet encoding/decoding. This lightweight server responds to DNS queries based on a predefined database, showcasing how to implement custom DNS resolution in Node.js.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
